General.Name: Union Insurance Co Ltd
General.Description: Union Insurance Co., Ltd. provides insurance products and services in Taiwan. It underwrites motor, traveler accident, fire property, marine, casualty, accident and health, automobile, engineering, and liability insurance, as well as reinsurance. The company was incorporated in 1963 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.219, Zhongxiao East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10690
